mapper.select: SELECT st.st_id as userId, st.department_id AS deptId, d.department_name AS deptName, st.rrn, st.st_name AS name, st.gender, st.address, st.email, st.profile, st.national, NVL(r.register_change_id, '재학') AS status FROM st JOIN department d ON st.department_id = d.department_id LEFT OUTER JOIN register r ON st.st_id = r.st_id WHERE st.st_id = #{userId}

SELECT pf.pf_id AS userId, pf.department_id AS deptId, d.department_name AS deptName, pf.rrn, pf.pf_name AS name, pf.gender, pf.address, pf.email, pf.national FROM pf JOIN department d ON d.department_id = pf.department_id WHERE pf.pf_id = #{userId}
